text: Push Notifications for Web App: Receive notifications even when your browser is closed.
Multi-Select: Move multiple files and shortcuts at once.
Bold Messages: Use ** before and after text to highlight it as BOLD.
Uploads: Attach up to 30 items per message.
Download Data is now also available on Web App (Edge & Chrome): Download all your data with advanced filters.
Bug Fixes & Improvements: General fixes for improved User Experience.
